title: Evaluating the effects of the CERES-Rice model to simulate upland rice (Oryza sativa L.) yield under different plant density and nitrogen management strategies in Fogera Plain, Northwest Ethiopia
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13
